data.convo: Would you like to come out with me tonight ? Sorry , I can ’ t . Tomorrow night , then ? I ’ d like to . But I ’ m afraid I can ’ t . I ’ m wondering if you like to go to the theatre then . That ’ s sounds great . Ok . How about give me a ring , then ? No . I ’ d better not . Why not ? Because I don ’ t think my husband would like it . Thank you for inviting me anyway .
